title: NO DEAL GAMA – The new protest site opposite Temple Trees
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan’s have set up new township named ‘No-Deal-Gama’ opposite Temple Trees, against Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe and political deals.

The site was earlier known as MynaGoGama, demanding the resignation of former Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa, and following his resignation, the areas was vacated, and thereafter a new site popped up soon after new Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe assumed duties.
Appeal Court issues interim order on Sri Lanka Rugby suspension
